transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir, bataiye. Abhi sahi hai?
Customer: Ji bolo sir, abhi zara.
Executive: Sir system pe aap abhi hai IndiaMART ke portal pe?
Customer: Kya hua?
Executive: IndiaMART pe abhi aapne open kiya hai system pe apne?
Customer: IndiaMART open kar raha hu.
Executive: Open karega karega.
Executive: Usko har baar ye aapna idhar PC pe desktop pe kyun nahi rehta wo?
Customer: Uh.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Kya hua phone bhul gaye?
Executive: Open karega sir, buyleads pe click karega.
Customer: Haan, buyleads pe click kiya.
Executive: Haan ji, ji bilkul. Right hand side pe dekh rahe honge sir waha pe past lead ka option aa raha hai aapko?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Past lead.
Customer: Haan, prasta.
Executive: Past transaction nahi sir uske niche aayenge. Thik hai? Jaha pe aap balance dekhte hai apna past lead dikh raha hoga sir waha pe dekhiye.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi, relative lead hai lead hai.
Customer: Wahi bhai hui na?
Executive: Nahi nahi sir niche dekhenge right side pe. Jaha pe balance check karte hai waha pe past lead ka option aa raha hai.
Customer: Profile hai ha.
Executive: Aa gaya sir?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Uspe click karega. Kiya. Abhi sabse pehle lead kaunsi open hoke dikha rahi hai sir aapko?
Customer: Cap screw abhi nylon nut.
Hanji?
Customer: Flange bolt.
Executive: Flange bolt aa raha hai Mumbai se. Right? Haan. To ye relevant hai aapke sir?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Ye lead relevant thi aapke?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Iski notification, inquiry, message kuch aapko nahi aaya kya?
Customer: Kidhar aaya ye? Kidhar abhi dikha aapne?
Executive: Aapko message jaane ki nahi aa raha?
Customer: Nahi message nahi aaya na. Message me aana chahiye na mail id diya hai na maine.
Executive: Yaha pe sir ek baar. Dekho ye bhi niche wali lead hai kidhar aayi hai? Hamare ko hamare idhar kaise dikhao catalog pe kidhar mili wo? 3000 box.
Customer: 3000 box.
Customer: Hex bolt hai 12 by 35 ka.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Kidhar hai?
Executive: 3000 bolt.
Executive: Sir yaha pe I am interested likha hua hai?
Customer: Haan? I am interested.
Customer: Kidhar? I am interested dekhiye likha hoga ki nahi right side me bada sa.
Executive: Haan. Uspe click karega sir. Jitne bhi aapke relevant isme dikh rahe hai.
Executive: Sir quantity aa rahi hai. Aisa nahi hai. Quantity bilkul nahi aa rahi hai. But aap thoda sa na portal ko login karke rakha kariye apne system me hamesha aur application hai. Quantity aa rahi hai sir aapko aisa nahi quantity nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan. Executive: Lekin jab tak aap consume karte hai sir wo lead se deal already baat kar lete hai wo. Thoda sa sir aapko aur active rehna padega bas aur kuch nahi hai.
Customer: Are active to rehta hu. Hum to abhi ye dekho sab me sab lead aa rahi hai lekin ye kidhar gayab hoti hai fir?
Executive: Sir ye deals dekho aap kya hai na sir portal pe active nahi rahoge to sir ye deal to already aapke yaha pe koi competition hai already sir. Aisa to hai nahi koi aur IndiaMART pe nahi hai waha pe. Wo kya karte hai sir connect kar lete hai na turant hi. Ab aapka system. Lekin wo hamare idhar dikhta nahi na portal pe kab dikhega abhi ye?
Executive: Notification for sure aata hoga sir aapko lekin jab tak aap usko open karte honge maan lijiye notification abhi aayi hai aapne aadhe ghante baad open kiya sir to kaha dikhega wo to hat jayega na fir. Hmm. Ye problem aa rahi hai sir. Last time bhi jab maine aapse baat ki thi maine kaha tha thoda portal login karke rakhiye apna. Kyunki agar aap isme bade portal. Login hamesha rakhiye sir. Apna mail aur ye portal login karke rakhiye application bhi sath me download karke rakhiye. Notification. Mobile pe mobile me application download karne se kya karna padega?
Executive: IndiaMART ka app download kar lijiye sir ab to aapne download to kiya hoga na application?
Customer: Nahi mobile me nahi kiya maine.
Executive: To mandatory hai sir. Application to bahut jyada mandatory hai. Waha pe sabse pehle notification aapko aata hai app pe.
Customer: Haan to fir wo to download karna padega.
Executive: Play store me jaaiye sir IndiaMART daaliyega waha pe. Ek minute ruko.
Executive: Dipanshu ne aapko ye login nahi karwaya sir? Application. Application sir mandatory hai login karke rakhna. Haan? Application bahut mandatory hai login karke rakhna sir. Abhi nahi bola hi nahi to kya bole? Abhi dekho. IndiaMART B to B aaya hai. Bilkul usi ko download karega sir.
Customer: Open kiya hai sir. Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji haan ji. Kya hai abhi? Ab apna jo primary wala number hai na sir usi ko usi se login karega isko. Kya? Primary number se login karega. Ye na wahi. Ho gaya login? Login ho gaya sir? Ho gaya ho gaya. Haan thik hai sir ho gaya login.
Executive: Yaha pe na sir aap isko thoda sa on karke hi rakha kariye apne aap ko. Are nahi nahi dekho ek minute wo 14 quantity 20 quantity ka dikhaega. Hmm. Quantity kam aayega to nahi chalega na sir. Jo aap dikha rahe hai to usme dikh raha hai. Ha ha bilkul sir ye ye na jo aapko mai dikha raha hu. Jaise maan lijiye 14 ghante pehle maine aapko ye dikhai ya wo jo flange wali bhi aapki thi thik hai Mumbai se aapne recommend me 14 ghante pehle dikhai. Ye sir waise hi aayi hai lead ye. Sir ye isko wire ne connect wire ne sir IndiaMART pe jo hai aapke Mumbai me aur bhi wo log connect kar lete hai sir. Aur aap batao sir ek wire ko paanch logo se jyada koi connect nahi kar pata. Char ya paanch supply bhi kar paate hai sir. To jis tak aap agar maan lo aapko notification aayi hai aapne bhi click karke details nikal li aur aapko call hi to karna hai sir. Wire ka traffic to aa raha hai sir aisa nahi hai. Thoda sa bas aap application pe download aapne kar liya hai. Application ka notification turant aata hai. Notification aapka yaha pe on bhi hai. Thik hai? System pe login rakha kariye. System open karke. System pe login karke rakha kariye. Login rehta hu. Ek baar sir apna product pe jaaiyega aap. Right side me dekhenge dashboard, profile, lead manager, buyleads product. Dikha sir? Haan product pure. Click karega sir. Kiya na? Right me right me aayenge more option likha hoga. Haan more option aa raha hai waha pe click karega statistics dikha rahi hai sir. Haan. Click karega. Kya? Upar se dekhenge sir score wali heading hai sir product performance. Haan. Click karega. Thik hai? Thoda sa na ek baar apni team se discuss kar lijiyega mai Dipanshu ko bol dunga uske liye bhi. Kyunki product score likha hua hai na sir dekh rahe hai aap? Haan. Kisi me 75 hai kisi me 90 hai kisi me 85 hai thik hai? To mai ye ka product score thoda sa kam hai sir. Thik hai? Wo isko badha lenge images wagera daal ke kaise karna hai wo bata dunga Dipanshu ko wo kar hi dega aapke samne se. Thik hai? Kisi kisi ke naam pe likhenge na jaise isko review kar lenge ek baar. Price aur baki wagera bhi dekh lenge. Is product ko ek baar aapke jitne dale hue honge apni team se bol ke isko bol dijiye review kar denge. Check karna hai. Review yaani ki check karna hai sir. Check kiya na? Ye sab okay hai sir apna sara kuch. Jaise aap MS washer me deal kar rahe hai all size me thik hai? Aapka inner diameter hai 12 mm. Other diameter hai 30 mm lekin aap all sizes me kar rahe hai sir. To uski thickness wagera sab kuch aapne mention kar diya hai. Haan. Plain washer me kaam kar rahe hai sir? Nahi kar rahe hum. Thik hai. Mai aapko lead suggest kar raha hu. Hello?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving lead notifications.

- Enquires about missing leads in the portal.

- Wants to know how to increase product score.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested downloading the IndiaMART app.

- Executive guided to check past leads.

- Executive explained about product score improvement.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will inform Dipanshu about product score.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, notification, application, product score
